name: @xagi/dev-inject
description: 框架感知的开发环境脚本注入工具 - 支持 Vite、Next.js、React 等现代框架的智能脚本注入

scripts.build: echo 'No build needed for Node.js CLI'
scripts.test:html: cd test-projects/html-project && node ../../bin/index.js install --remote=/sdk/dev-monitor.js --framework && node ../../bin/index.js uninstall --framework
scripts.test:vite: cd test-projects/vite-project && node ../../bin/index.js install --remote=/sdk/dev-monitor.js --framework && node ../../bin/index.js uninstall --framework
scripts.test:next-pages: cd test-projects/next-pages-project && node ../../bin/index.js install --remote=/sdk/dev-monitor.js --framework && node ../../bin/index.js uninstall --framework
scripts.test:next-app: cd test-projects/next-app-project && node ../../bin/index.js install --remote=/sdk/dev-monitor.js --framework && node ../../bin/index.js uninstall --framework
